Articles.Content:
![D76DeF4.png](http://i.imgur.com/D76DeF4.png)

**Requries** - [TextureReplacer 2.4.7+](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/107471-0-90-TextureReplacer-2-1-2-new-thread-the-old-one-is-broken)

**Download link** - [Dropbox](https://www.dropbox.com/s/7tp6ikf1u84qcgg/ScottManley.rar?dl=0)

**\*License -** **** [![80x15.png](https://licensebuttons.net/l/by-nc-sa/4.0/80x15.png)](http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/4.0/)

Are you tired of not having Scott Manley in game? Are you tired of not looking at his pretty face while you playing KSP?

ENOUGH! NOW YOU CAN LOOK AT HIM AS MUCH AS YOU WANT!

Download our Scott Manley Head Pack today and get 50% more Scott!!!

**Scott...** **If you see this...** **forgive me...**

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-20T10:09:40Z" title="07/20/2015 10:09  AM" data-short="8 yr">July 20, 2015</time> by Potatto**
I don't know if this is hilarious or horrifying.
Now I've seen everything.

O.o is my only response.

Also, kill it with Fire!

> 
> O.o is my only response.
> Also, kill it with Fire!

My thoughts exactly
Why! Oh god why somebody please remove this and burn it with fire d: Oh dear god d:
My eyes! What have you done?! ![:confused:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_huh.gif)
Umm I would anticipate this mod being featured on his channel within the week. If not tomorrow.

HAHAHAHA I CAN'T STOP LAUGHING XD

caps sorry

--[[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0b4d_36AkcE\]--](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0b4d_36AkcE%5D--) My reaction to his ungodly, Lovecraftian horror from the darkest depth of Stanley Kubricks wet dreams... Any Moderators viewing this, Please for the sake of Kerbal dignity wipe this mod of the face of Kerbin... ;-;
Holy. Crap. I just spewed beer all over my screen. This is the greatest mod I've ever seen in the history of ever.
Just imagine him smile through the kerbal mouth.
Can not unsee.
I won't mind this...if you could move that manely mouth to match the kerbal one

If you want to hear nice stuff only, it's nice.

But if you want the truth, DEAR KOD KILL IT WITH FIRE!

> 
> I won't mind this...if you could move that manely mouth to match the kerbal one

I moved mouth up because it looked more horribly than this version ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
I not sure it's legit to use Scott Manley's likeness in this manner...

Of course it's legit.

is it wise? that's the real question.

is make me lol ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) scoot why why ![;.;](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cry.gif)
That is... probably the most nightmare inducing thing I've seen in months...

I came here looking fore something new and interesting, and I find... THIS.

I didn't know it was possible to laugh and cringe at the same time
This is hilarious. Cant wait to see Scott's reaction to this ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
hes ded

This is stuff the horrors are made of ![:0.0:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_shocked.gif) This abomination needs to be killed with silver bullets and napalm. And then shot into the Sun.
rip scooot hes a kerbal hes creepy ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)
